//: Enemy Roster Overhaul: The goal is to create a 'strategic triangle'. Grunts are generalists, Runners test speed, and Guardians test armor-piercing.

grunt.//: The baseline, all-around enemy. No special strengths or weaknesses.
grunt.name: Grunt

runner.//: NEW ENEMY: Fast and weak. Designed to punish slow-firing towers and test map coverage.
runner.name: Runner

tank.//: REBALANCED: Now a true 'health sponge'. Has moderate armor, but its main threat is its massive HP pool.
tank.name: Tank

guardian.//: NEW ENEMY: The 'armor wall'. Low HP but extremely high armor. Makes armor-shredding upgrades essential.
guardian.name: Guardian
